thread.title: NCAA accuses UL of major recruiting violations

title: NCAA accuses UL of major recruiting violations
text:
Published By: Clarion Ledger: Sports - Today 
The NCAA has accused UL of football recruiting violations tied to ACT scores and cash payments by an ex-assistant ...
